name: hobb-api
description: Hobb API Server for Rebus Reader

scripts.test-unit: cross-env SECRETORKEY=kick-opossum-snowiness ISSUER=auth.reader-api.test DOMAIN=https://reader-api.test tap -R classic --cov tests/unit/*.test.js
scripts.test-integration: cross-env SECRETORKEY=kick-opossum-snowiness ISSUER=auth.reader-api.test DOMAIN=https://reader-api.test NODE_ENV=test tap -c -R classic --cov tests/integration/index.js
scripts.test-google: cross-env SECRETORKEY=kick-opossum-snowiness ISSUER=auth.reader-api.test DOMAIN=https://reader-api.test NODE_ENV=test tap -c -R classic --cov tests/google-integration/index.js
scripts.test-models: cross-env SECRETORKEY=kick-opossum-snowiness ISSUER=auth.reader-api.test DOMAIN=https://reader-api.test NODE_ENV=test tap -R classic --cov tests/models/index.js
scripts.test-performance: cross-env SECRETORKEY=kick-opossum-snowiness ISSUER=auth.reader-api.test DOMAIN=https://reader-api.test NODE_ENV=test tap -c -R min tests/performance/index.js
scripts.test: npm run test-unit && npm run test-integration && npm run test-models && npm run test-google
scripts.dev-server: cross-env SECRETORKEY=kick-opossum-snowiness ISSUER=auth.reader-api.test DOMAIN=http://localhost:8080 nodemon dev.js
scripts.doc: swagger-jsdoc -d swaggerDef.js -o doc.json && node_modules/.bin/api2html -o docs/index.html -l javascript--nodejs doc.json

author: Rebus Foundation
